name: Shipping by City for Woocommerce
author: C-Metric

sections.description:
Transform your WooCommerce store’s shipping options with our intuitive “Shipping by City” option. Say goodbye to the complexities of shipping by postal code and streamline your logistics by configuring shipping options based on cities instead. This plugin is designed to make managing shipping zones and rates easier and more flexible

Features of the plugin include:

  • Provide complete solution for Shipping by city option in our E-commerce site instead on Shipping by Postal code for every Zone.
  • it include Option to configure all cities for every Zone under Woocommerce settings.
  • Simple-configuration – just install,setup and enjoy.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload shipping-by-city-for-woocommerce.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the menu name WooCommerce->settings.
  4. Now we can see new option call “Advance Shipping Zone”.
  5. After click on this page we can see configuration form.
  6. Now just configure & see the result on checkout page.
sections.faq:
How do I activate the plugin in WordPress?

To activate this plugin, first, go to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress Admin Dashboard. If you’re using the direct install method, search for the plugin by name, click Install Now, and then Activate. Alternatively, for the upload method, click Upload Plugin, select the .zip file from your computer, click Install Now, and then Activate

How do I access the plugin settings?

Go to WooCommerce > Settings, find “Advance Shipping Zone,” configure the settings, and see the results on the checkout page
